member.name: Overload:System.Transactions.PreparingEnlistment.ForceRollback
member.summary: Indicates that the transaction should be rolled back.

member.name: Overload:System.Transactions.SinglePhaseEnlistment.Aborted
member.summary: Represents a callback that is used to indicate to the transaction manager that the transaction should be rolled back.

member.name: Overload:System.Transactions.SinglePhaseEnlistment.InDoubt
member.summary: Represents a callback that is used to indicate to the transaction manager that the status of the transaction is in doubt.

member.name: Overload:System.Transactions.TransactionOptions.Equals
member.summary: Determines whether this instance and the specified object are equal.

member.name: Overload:System.Transactions.Transaction.EnlistDurable
member.summary: Enlists a durable resource manager to participate in a transaction.

member.name: Overload:System.Transactions.Transaction.EnlistVolatile
member.summary: Enlists a volatile resource manager to participate in a transaction.

member.name: Overload:System.Transactions.Transaction.Equals
member.summary: Determines whether this transaction and the specified object are equal.
